column5: Does anyone know of a good place to catch crappie around Kitchener/waterloo? I got lucky last year and caught a couple late season crappie in Bloomingdale would it be worth trying there? Any input would be greatly appreciated thank you
There are some crappie at the ponds in Bloomingdale or you could try Shades mill or Guelph lake once they open. There are also some in the Grand river but you may have to do some searching.
